description: When a FC ping test is finished and the instance of
h3cFcPingTrapOnCompletion associated with the test
is set to 'true', this notification occurred.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingCompletionNotify H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingIndex u 9999 H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingVsan u 1 H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingAddressType i 1 H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingAddress s EXA H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingReqPackets u 9999 H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingResPackets u 9999

description: The index of the current FC ping entry. This object
identifies a FC ping request entry uniquely in a
specified VSAN (Virtual Storage Area Network).
variables.name: H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingIndex

description: The VSAN on which the FC ping request will be
performed. If the corresponding instance value of
h3cFcPingOperStatus is 'inProgress', the object
cannot be modified.
variables.name: H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingVsan

description: The type of the corresponding instance of
h3cFcPingAddress object.
variables.name: H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingAddressType

description: The address to which the route will be pinged.
This object will contain an 8 octet long WWN(World Wide Name)
if the value of the associated instance of h3cFcPingAddressType
object is 'wwn'.
This object will contain a 3 octet long Fibre Channel Address ID
if the value of the associated instance of h3cFcPingAddressType
object is 'fcid'.
variables.name: H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingAddress

description: The number of FC ping packets request in this sequence.
variables.name: H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingReqPackets

description: The number of FC ping packets response in this sequence.
variables.name: H3C-FC-PING-MIB::h3cFcPingResPackets
